gmit

Class Runner4

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmit.Runner4

  • public class Runner4
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Pawel

    This class is a main runner class for my web crawler. It searches throught website using mix of best first search, beam search and breadth search. It uses JSuop API to retrive website contents and parse them as necessery to find best score.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException

      • visit_url

        public void visit_url(UrlNode url,
             java.lang.String search_word)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Main method that goes throu URL nodes, extracts their childern, scores them than picks the best one and goes all over again.
        Parameters:
        url - Url address of a website made as an UrlNode object.
        search_word - String containing a single word we will search for on websites
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • score_method

        public static void score_method(java.lang.String curr_page_url)
        Method for scoring each website. Based on ammount of words and depending on how relevant the contents of a website are to the keyword the more points are given.
        Parameters:
        curr_page_url - String containing url of a page that is currently being checked
        Throws:
        Catches - any exceptions, mostly IO when sometimes div may be unaviable on website.

      • get_document

        public static void get_document(java.lang.String url)
        Connecting to desired website.
        Parameters:
        url - Url address of a website that program will connect to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • count_keywords

        public static double count_keywords(java.lang.String word,
                    org.jsoup.select.Elements page_text)
        Method that will count and score importance of keywords on each website. Mainly for heuristics purposes.
        Parameters:
        word - String of a word we are looking for.
        page_text - Element of a page we want to check for keywords. In this case its either title, div or html.
        Returns:
        Number of keywords found and extra values assigned to them

      • extractLinks

        public java.util.LinkedList<UrlNode> extractLinks()
        Extracting children nodes from curret node. This metod has some filttering as well, just to make sure we dont add links we already have or links we dont need to check.
        Returns:
        LinkedList with children links.
